title: Have an idea for changing leaverbuster
body: Why dont you JUST make it that if you leave 2 many games, you can join a game without waiting in a priority queue, but you do not get a level up with your character or IP. This is better since if they have to go under something that wasnt planned, they can continue playing League. On the other hand, for the guys who rage quit and want everything their way, they cannot get IP or level up even if they did good. This is just my opinion dou. Tell me your thoughts. It is ok to hate, just explain why.

replies.body:
Or how about this.

Instead of wanting to change LeaverBuster, change whatever it is that causes LeaverBuster to attack you.

So I have to change unexpected things? A little hard when it is unexpected... I get leaverbuster mostly from unexpected occurences, and they sadly happen frequently. I try to combat this by planning out my schedule, but every like week or 2 days, something interupts it and I have to quit league

Yeah no.

There are only so many "unpredictable" causes that can occur.
Power outages and a storms and medical emergencies are really it.

Internet going out? Your provider will tell you days in advance when this will occur.

Family stuff? You'll know days in advance.

Food is ready? You'll know hours in advance.

Computer failure? There'll be signs that point to it happening, viruses, slow performance, freezing. You should get that checked out and actually spend time, effort and money on keeping your computer healthy.

When it comes down to it, you can plan your time in LoL easily around anything that will cause you to DC, and fix the issue that will have you leave a game.
You can't stop someone from bursting into your house and shooting your family, but we all know that is highly unlikely to happen, this is OCE and not NA.

> You can't stop someone from bursting into your house and shooting your family

Happened last week, not in my unit doe
What about the people that own all champions/runes and are level 30?

They is true, but it will get boring if you have all of the champions and you are still playing... There is nothing to achieve. But like mystic ninja, for trolls who dont give a s**t about xp,ip etc. I need to find a way on how we can fix this

> Yea, that is true... But I really want to see if there is some form or method on how to combat this.

There is no definite method, but the best one would be, if everyone stayed positive or muted the trolls, maybe the flames would die down and everyone could enjoy LoL as it is, of course something this large a scale would be like ending poverty.

Alright the flaws with this is your forgetting the 10% of the LoL community called trolls. They dont give a shit about ip, xp or lp. They just enjoy other people rage at them. That is why your idea is invalid.
Yea, that is true... But I really want to see if there is some form or method on how to combat this.
